attributes.action: Stop Boris Johnson from becoming UK Prime Minister
attributes.background: After the outcome of the EU Referendum, our Prime Minister David Cameron resigned. Boris led a Brexit campaign that was based on fear, misleading the general public. His attitude and approach would diminish the standing  of the U.K in the eyes of our European colleagues. Stop Boris from being PM.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
